title: Getting Dressed Up
itunes:title: Getting Dressed Up
description:
In their debut episode, hosts Bobby Flay and Sophie Flay cover what it means to get dressed up! 

In this episode you’ll find out:

  • What makes a dining experience an “occasion?”
  • In which era does bobby think he should have lived?
  • What types of special dining experiences are available to us today?


And of course, listen along to hear Bobby teach Sophie a simple recipe that you can cook for your next special occasion. 

Follow Host’s Bobby Flay and Sophie Flay on instagram to get future updates on their brand new podcast, “Always Hungry” from iHeartRadio. 


Bobby Flay: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
